info.name: Legal Platform API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Legal Platform with account management, profiles, plans, payments, consultations, requests, memberships, billing, notifications, and call requests

item.name: Test Scenarios
item.description: Sequential test scenarios for complete flows

item.name: Scenario 1: Membership & Quota Flow
item.description: Complete membership lifecycle with quota consumption

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Premium Plan",
    "nameAr": "الخطة المميزة",
    "description": "Premium membership with full access to legal services",
    "descriptionAr": "عضوية مميزة مع وصول كامل للخدمات القانونية",
    "price": 500,
    "currency": "SAR",
    "billingCycle": "monthly",
    "quota": {
        "consultationsPerMonth": 10,
        "opinionsPerMonth": 5,
        "casesPerMonth": 2,
        "callMinutesPerMonth": 60
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Priority support",
        "Document storage",
        "Video consultations"
    ],
    "isActive": true
}

exec: pm.test('Invoice created with pending status', function() {

item.name: Scenario 3: Membership Upgrade Flow
item.description: Upgrade membership tier and verify quota changes

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Enterprise Plan",
    "nameAr": "خطة المؤسسات",
    "description": "Enterprise membership for businesses",
    "descriptionAr": "عضوية المؤسسات للشركات",
    "price": 1000,
    "currency": "SAR",
    "billingCycle": "monthly",
    "quota": {
        "consultationsPerMonth": 20,
        "opinionsPerMonth": 10,
        "casesPerMonth": 5,
        "callMinutesPerMonth": 120

        "Dedicated account manager",
        "Priority support 24/7",
        "Unlimited document storage"
    ],
    "isActive": true
}
